dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.trigger

Class TriggerRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.trigger.TriggerRegistry

  • public class TriggerRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages all registered triggers.

    The TriggerRegistry manages the extension-point dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.plugin.trigger and reads all triggers registered via this extension-point. In addition triggers can be registered via the method addTrigger(AbstractTrigger). For more information concerning triggers read AbstractTrigger.

    This class is a singleton instance that can be queried with: 

     TriggerRegistry.getInstance()

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    2008.b
